_description: Chain hospital domains with branch counts. Selectors populated after first successful crawl.

velyb.kr.notes: All branches use same URL. Branch differentiation via popup or content.

tonesclinic.co.kr.notes: Non-standard menu names. SNS in dedicated menu.

optimization_strategy.step1: Crawl one sample branch per chain domain
optimization_strategy.step2: Record successful CSS selectors for social links and doctor pages
optimization_strategy.step3: Verify selectors on 2-3 random sibling branches
optimization_strategy.step4: If verification passes, apply selectors to all remaining siblings
optimization_strategy.step5: If verification fails, fall back to per-hospital agent crawl
